definition: guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general

sentences.english: The males have long, curved horns for defending against enemies.
sentences.chinese: 成年雄性藏羚羊頭上長有豎琴形狀的角用於禦敵。

sentences.english: She touched the strings of the harp.
sentences.chinese: 她輕輕地彈撥豎琴的弦。

sentences.english: It went on singing until the sound of the ogre's snoring shook the castle once again.
sentences.chinese: 金豎琴一直唱啊唱，直到怪物的鼾聲又震得城堡直晃。

sentences.english: Jack saw his chance, climbed through the window, grabbed the harp and ran off to the beanstalk.
sentences.chinese: 傑克抓住機會，爬過窗戶抓起豎琴跑向豆莖。

sentences.english: They take the timbrel, and the harp, and rejoice at the sound of the organ.
sentences.chinese: 他們伴着手鼓與豎琴歌唱，隨着笛聲歡呼。

sentences.english: Saying the service of four mainland, Lei Yin total forest, dark blue accounted for harp.
sentences.chinese: 話說本服的四塊大陸，雷音佔森林，深藍佔豎琴。

sentences.english: Harmony is to the harp as the mind is to the body.
sentences.chinese: 和聲對於豎琴就像精神對於身體。

sentences.english: A Harp seal pup in the Cabot Strait, Canada. Photograph: Stewart Cook/IFAW
sentences.chinese: 以上是加拿大卡波特海峽的一隻豎琴小海豹。

sentences.english: After breakfast, the ogre sat beside his golden harp.
sentences.chinese: 喫完早餐後，怪物坐在了他的金豎琴旁邊。

sentences.english: Yes one of those big angel-using harps.
sentences.chinese: 是的，就是那種天使彈的大豎琴。

sentences.english: She learned to play the Autoharp.
There is a vast stretch of heavenly realm and across it an angel carrying a harp comes leisurely but surely.
sentences.chinese: 廣闊的天際，一個天使帶着豎琴悠閒但是堅定的來了。

sentences.english: The harpist is sitting there in rags.
sentences.chinese: 彈着豎琴的女子坐在那兒，衣衫襤褸。

sentences.english: The background music, Moonlight, was from Claude Debussy (1862-1918). I feel the harp in it, maybe.
sentences.chinese: 德彪西的《月光》，我似乎感受到了豎琴的音色。

sentences.english: Julie played to Boris the most mournful nocturnes on the harp.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉用豎琴給鮑里斯彈奏最悲哀的夜曲。

sentences.english: Love took up the harp of Life, and smote on all the chords with might;
sentences.chinese: 愛情取走生活的豎琴，重重擊在了每一根弦上。

definition: Haydn (name)/Franz Joseph Haydn (1732-1809), Austrian classical composer
double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
